description: Phone numbers in the United States typically consist of 11 digits — the 1-digit country code, a 3-digit area code and a 7-digit telephone number. The 7-digit telephone number is further comprised of a 3-digit central office or exchange code and a 4-digit subscriber number. The country code of USA is +1.

Phone numbers in the United States typically consist of 11 digits — the 1-digit country code, a 3-digit area code and a 7-digit telephone number. The 7-digit telephone number is further comprised of a 3-digit central office or exchange code and a 4-digit subscriber number. The country code of USA is +1.

Kirill (Nikita Volkov) gets back after a work festivity to discover another person living in his loft. Before long he tracks down that nobody recalls that him-Not even the public authority! He finds he has been decided to be an import/export officer, an individual who can open ways to different universes.

This film feels like a work in progress. There was so much addressed and packed into this film. It would have done well to extend a few pieces of the storyline. The sentiment among Kirill and Anna had no profundity or goal. Despite the fact that there were a couple of contacting minutes they weren’t adequately long to allow you to mind.
